Table of Contents

Namespace EnergyPerformance.Helpers

Classes

BudgetStringConverter

Converter class for converting budget calculated in model to string for display in the View.

CostStringConverter

Converter class to convert cost calculated from the model to a string in the correct format for display in the View.

CpuInfo

Container class to hold the current CPU usage of the system and provide access to the Controller class in C++/CLI to perform hybrid core shift operations.

EnergyUsageLocalizedStringConverter

Converter class to convert strings in the EnergyUsage page to localized strings stored in Resources.

EnumToIndexConverter

Converter class to convert a given theme to an index corresponding to a combobox (dropdown button).

FrameExtensions
NavigationHelper
PercentToColourConverter

Converter class to convert a double to a colour based on the value. Used to change the colour of the ProgressRings on the home page.

PowerInfo

Container class to hold the current power usage of the system.

PowerUsageStringConverter

Converter class for the live power value currently measured so it can be displayed in the UI's home page.

ResourceExtensions
RuntimeHelper
SettingsStorageExtensions
